name: Ryobi HP44L 4-Volt Twist Screwdriver Kit
description: The new Ryobi 4-Volt Twist Screwdriver handle easily changes between a standard pistol grip drivers to a straight screwdriver to meet all of your screw driving needs. This comes complete with the twist screwdriver, charger and screw driving bits. For project ideals and member exclusive offers, visit Ryobi Nation.California residents: see Proposition 65 information2-speed gearbox (200/600 RPM) (no load speed) for a wide range of applications1/4 in. hex collet for fast and convenient bit changes2-finger trigger for added speed controlNew and improved GRIPZONE over mold for optimum grip and user comfortHP44L screwdriver, charger, (2) screwdriver bits and operator's manualQUICKTURN allows for easy change between standard driver to stick driverHome Depot Protection Plan:
